decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.  REASON: Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). In accordance with the adopted Ealing Unitary Development Plan, 'Plan for the Environment' (2004). | All external materials to be used in the development shall match those shown on the approved drawings and as described on the planning application form, unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.  REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the original dwelling house, in accordance with the Council's adopted UDP policy 4.1 of the adopted Ealing Unitary Development Plan 'Plan for the Environment' (2004).
description: Rear conservatory extension as workshop (B2 Use Class) (Retrospective Planning Permission Sought)
